sp_widget.name: Digital Suggestion Box
sp_widget.option_schema: [{"hint":"The title of the opened card","name":"title","section":"Presentation","default_value":"What do you think?","label":"Title","type":"string"},{"hint":"The description about what the user will answer/write about.","name":"description","section":"Presentation","default_value":"Let us know what you think about this page, did you like it? It could be improved with your suggestions.","label":"Description","type":"string"},{"hint":"The placeholder for the input","name":"input_placeholder","section":"Presentation","default_value":"Write here your suggestions and thoughts for this page.","label":"Input (placeholder)","type":"string"},{"displayValue":"User","hint":"Select the user that will be responsible to receive and read the suggestions.","name":"who_will_be_notified","section":"Data","label":"Who will be notified?","type":"reference","value":"sys_user","ed":{"reference":"sys_user"}},{"hint":"The text of the button when the card is closed","name":"button_text_closed","section":"Presentation","default_value":"Do you have any suggestion?","label":"Button Text (closed)","type":"string"},{"hint":"The text of the button when the card is open","name":"button_text_open","section":"Presentation","default_value":"Send","label":"Button Text (open)","type":"string"},{"hint":"The text of the button to send again another suggestion","name":"button_text_send_again","section":"Presentation","default_value":"Do you have more suggestions?","label":"Button Text (send again)","type":"string"},{"hint":"The text above the emojis","name":"rating_description","section":"Presentation","default_value":"How did you feel while navigating through this page?","label":"Rating Description","type":"string"},{"hint":"Establish a category list, allowing users to designate the category to which their suggestion belongs. Example categories: Layout, Infrastructure, HR.","name":"category_list","section":"Presentation","label":"Category List","type":"string"},{"name":"show_anonymous_field","section":"Presentation","default_value":"false","label":"Show the 'Anonymous' field.","type":"boolean"}]
